source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000000_ULTIMAIs it sanctum you seek, my wayward children?
Or perhaps you are come in search of power.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000000_ULTIMA“汝ハ 我ガ眷顧隷属ノ者カ……？
　ソレトモ 地ヲ這ウ 非力ナル者カ……？”

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000010_ULTIMAThat which lies at your feet─that blessed bauble─can grant you both.
You need but will it so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000010_ULTIMA“誰デモ構ワヌ…… 足下ノ石ヲ 汝ニ与エヨウ……
　汝ノ望ミヲ ソノ石ガ 叶エヨウゾ……”

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000020_ULTIMANow take up your salvation and begone.
Mortal agency in matters divine shall not be suffered.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000020_ULTIMA“ソノ石ヲ 手ニシタラ コノ煉獄カラ立チ去ルガヨイ……
　我ガ営為ヲ 邪魔スルモノナカレ……”

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000100_ULTIMAI am your mother. I am your maker! I. Am. Ivalice!
Consign me unto darkness and your light will be forever lost!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000100_ULTIMA“我ハ イヴァリースノ神ニシテ 非力ナル者ドモノ母ゾ……
　何故 我ガ陰府ニ…… 配謫サレネバ…… ナラヌ……”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000200_SEIRYU<tab>Prove me wrong, mortals! Make me submit─or die for your insolence!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000200_SEIRYUキミが正しいというのなら 戦いで僕を否定してみせろ！
アラミタマを解放するッ！
